Botulism (Tests for Clostridium botulinum by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

    33695-8 Clostridium botulinum [Presence] in Isolate by Organism specific culture
    87948-6 Clostridium botulinum [Presence] in Stool by Organism specific culture
